thread.title: Paris Jackson wishes happy birthday to little brother Blanket with vintage snap as he turns 15
thread.title_full: Paris Jackson wishes happy birthday to little brother Blanket with vintage snap as he turns 15

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Paris Jackson wishes happy birthday to little brother Blanket with vintage snap as he turns 15
text:
Paris Jackson wishes happy birthday to little brother Blanket with vintage snap as he turns 15 "I want you to stay a baby forever," she wrote Share Happy birthday, Blanket! (Photo: WENN.com) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Paris Jackson sent a sweet birthday message to her little brother as he celebrated his 15th birthday. 
Michael Jackson's middle offspring took to social media to send some love to her younger sibling, saying she can't believe how fast he is growing. 
"ug my little man is 15 today. slow the f**k down, I want you to stay a baby forever," she wrote. 
"This lil dude right here is one of the most strong, intelligent, and determined people I know. watching you grow up and slowly become a man is like super terrifying but I honestly can't tell you how proud I am. I love you so much B." 
The accompanying picture shows them pulling silly faces to camera. 
Meanwhile, Paris recently opened up about their late dad, saying he inspires "all" she does. 
The 18-year-old star believes "99 percent of her inspiration" comes from him as he has "always been her world". (Photo: WENN.com) Prince Michael Jackson, Blanket Jackson, Paris Jackson Michael Jackson's family and children immortalized their late father in cement outside the historic Grauman's Chinese Theater in Hollywood (Photo: Wenn) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
